name: Attack On Prisoner
description:
Attack On Prisoner is a typing fighting game. Avoid the prisoners for running away. Gulag with Advanced Technology.  

-Show your typing skill by defending the prison. 

- Play 6 Playable Level & Fight the boss in the last level

- If you're lucky, you can get skill items to beat the level easier

Controls

Use Keyboard to type the words as fast as you can!

Team Member

  • M Arief Ismirianda - Programmer
  • Andi M Ayyub - 2D Artist
  • Edi Santoso - 3D Artist

Credits

  • -Bensound (Music)
  •  Zapslat (SFX)
